awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE KIALEGEE TRIBAL TOWN TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL CONDUCT COMMUNITY OUTREACH, RECYCLING, AND CONTINUE TO BUILD CAPACITY OF ENVIRONMENTAL STAFF THROUGH ATTENDING TRAININGS AND MEETINGS.ACTIVITIES:SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CAPACITY OF OFFICE STAFF TO LEARN AND ADDRESS ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES, PROVIDE OUTREACH, IMPLEMENT SOLID
WASTE MANAGEMENT PRACTICES AND STRATEGIES TO PREVENT ILLEGAL DUMPING, RECYCLING. SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FEDERAL FINANCIAL REPORT, AND QUALITY MANAGEMENT PLAN. THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE KIALEGEE TRIBAL TOWN.
NEW AWARD FOR THE FY 2023 2% PLANNING FUNDS IN THE AMOUNT OF $3,289.52 AND FY 2023 TRIBAL TRANSPORTATION DESIGN/CONSTRUCTION IN THE AMOUNT OF $143,874.61.
NEW AWARD FOR FY 2024 SPECIAL APPROPRIATION IN THE AMOUNT OF $42,046.38 AND FY 2025 TRIBAL SHARES IN THE AMOUNT OF $10,000.00

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Department of Housing and Urban Development
